entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Local blowing snow north of Cape Ray in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022
